title: Jonas Vingegaard Stomps Rivals, Mark Cavendish Misses Time Cut at Tirreno-Adriatico
content:
Two-time Tour de France champion posted some impressive power numbers to bury rivals: 'The plan worked perfectly.'

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Stomps Rivals, Mark Cavendish Misses Time Cut at Tirreno-Adriatico on Velo.
author: ahood
